amendment.description: An amendment No. 69 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit funds from being used to regulate trailers under the Clean Air Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 69 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit funds from being used to regulate trailers under the Clean Air Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Loudermilk amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
